title: User journey feedback event

xdm:timestamp.title: Timestamp for feedback event
xdm:timestamp.description: Time of generation of feedback event

xdm:messageId.title: Message ID
xdm:messageId.description: A unique identifier across all services

xdm:externalID.title: External ID
xdm:externalID.description: External ID, for example: delivery id

xdm:imsOrgID.title: Ims Organizational ID
xdm:imsOrgID.description: IMS org id of the tenant.

xdm:instanceName.title: Instance Name
xdm:instanceName.description: Name of the instance originating this event.

xdm:channel.title: Channel Name
xdm:channel.description: The channel related to this FeedbackEvent.

xdm:profile.title: Profile
xdm:profile.description: The recipient of the message. This property is primarily used to link the message to a Profile.

xdm:serviceName.title: Service Name
xdm:serviceName.description: The name of the service originating this event

xdm:stage.title: Stage Name
xdm:stage.description: Stage of the service originating this event, for example: prep, mailmerge, delivery

meta:enum.blacklist: Particular event has blacklist status. MCPNS sends status as 'blacklist' if push fails due to blacklisting.

xdm:eventCode.title: Event Code
xdm:eventCode.description: Event code to understand the issue

xdm:eventMessage.title: Event Message
xdm:eventMessage.description: A more contextual message for developer to understand the issue
